Type.Name: RowInsertedEventHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void RowInsertedEventHandler(object o, Gda.RowInsertedEventArgs args);

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the RowInsertedEventHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the RowInsertedEventHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the RowInsertedEventHandler is removed from the event.
